name: Anais: Battle Android
description:
A simple side-scrolling shooter. Play as Anais, a battle android from the future, and fight against a colorful array of alien invaders!

There's only one level since we were kinda on a time constraint.

Coding: Guardly http://guardly.tumblr.com/

Art: Drblank http://drblank.tumblr.com/

Music: Kistol https://soundcloud.com/kistol
